scripts.docs: cp README.md lib/README.md && (cd lib/ && exec npm run docs)
scripts.guide: cat lib/GUIDE.md lib/note/GUIDE.md lib/gamut/GUIDE.md lib/scale/GUIDE.md > GUIDE.md
scripts.dist: browserify lib/index.js | uglifyjs > dist/music.kit.min.js && ls -all dist/
scripts.disc: browserify --full-paths lib/index.js | uglifyjs | discify > docs/disc.html && open docs/disc.html
scripts.build: npm run guide && npm run docs && npm run dist && npm run coverage
scripts.climate: npm run coverage && npm run codeclimate
